Package org.twelve.controllers

Class InventoryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.twelve.controllers.InventoryController
  • public class InventoryController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller that deals with your inventory.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      InventoryController​(UseCasePool useCasePool)
      Constructor to initialize all the instances, from ManualConfig, and add options to actions depending on the user's permissions
